title: M8: Training custom engines and getting it all
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: advanced. * SUPERVISION: teacher-guided. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 20 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: none. * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: not necessary. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: many other concepts appear in the screen, it will be nice to remind the students to hover with their mouse over fields in the Train screen to get a live explanation or to go back to chapters 7 and 8 to double check some concepts.
